thread.title: Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group and Urban Grind TV to Expand Footprint!
thread.title_full: Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group and Urban Grind TV to Expand Footprint! - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group and Urban Grind TV to Expand Footprint!
text:
Streetbeatz Ent & Media Group and Urban Grind TV has signed a Production Partnership agreement to expand the Footprint of their Broadcast show URBAN GRIND TV.
 CORAL SPRINGS, FL, October 22, Streetbeatz Ent & Media Group Inc. announced the signing of a Production Partnership with Urban Grind TV.
Streetbeatz Ent & Media Group and Urban Grind TV has signed a Production Partnership agreement to expand the Footprint of their Broadcast show URBAN GRIND TV. The plan is to rollout the show via Broadcast nationally and to develop new projects that include a Film Release, Live Events and Additional Broadcast Programing. The planned new market rollout is scheduled to begin in early, 2016.
In a statement from Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group management - "We are excited about this signing and feel this is just the beginning of a long and prosperous relationship!" Our partnership with Urban Grind TV adds a new dimension for both parties that will create additional opportunities for all. This is a great opportunity for both parties to execute on their Business plans where they can combine Music, Film, Talent and Live Events Properties and Clients to develop new broadcast segments!"
Streetbeatz will provide additional details regarding all agreements and as well all other matters of the company in the coming weeks in the YEAR END STATE OF THE COMPANY ADDRESS.
About Streetbeatz Entertainment & Media Group Inc. -Production, Distribution and Licensing of Film, Music and Live Event production. The company is expanding relationships with artist booking, management, merchandising, publishing/licensing, gaming and live event partners.
About Urban Grind TV (UGTV) - Urban Grind TV is a Multi-Cultural Urban Entertainment Television Show that features Urban, Rock, R&B, and Pop artists from around the country. Urban Grind TV is also an Award Winning Television Show and full service multimedia production company specializing in audio/video production, media event coverage, television commercials/promotion, photography, web design, tour support, booking and brand management. UGTV has become part of the fabric in the Hip-Hop community throughout the Midwest and has won The Chicago Music Awards for the last 4 consecutive years for Best Music TV Show. Their show has a no guns/no violence policy to be displayed on their programing. They produced a segment titled "Street Order" on violence in Chicago with Wakka Flocka and Bo Deal for Plugged Fella Music Group. UGTV Sports has created and produced segments featuring Boxing and MMA leagues along with Major Productions for NBC, The History Channel, Toyota, Chicago Auto Show, Red Bull, The Source Magazine, Dress Code, Chicago Music Awards, Crossroads Music Festival, Sirus/XM Satellite Radio, UniverSoul Circus, Riot Fest, and Fuse TV. UGTV has had the opportunity to travel the country to interview and feature some of the biggest names in the Industry like Snoop Dogg, Ludacris, Musiq Soulchild, NEYO, Rakim, Paul Dianno, Joe Jonas, Donnell Rawlings, Pam Grier and Tito Jackson. They have covered events such as The Bet Awards, The Grammys and SXSW. http://urbangrindtv.com/
